subject: For Your Attention:
body:
For Your Attention:
I am Mrs. Zainab Ahmed Newly-appointed Acting Minister of Finance of
Nigeria, I am contacting you respect to your fund total amount of
$9,200,000.00 Million that was being withheld by the former Minister of
Finance. Today, I have an outstanding order from the Office of the
Presidency to release your due contract fund without delay. Do reconfirm
your Resident Address, Private Email Address, Phone and 
copy of your
valid ID
. I look forward to your earliest confirmation of this email.
Mrs. Zainab Ahmed
Newly-Appointed Ac

subject: Re: For Your Attention:
body:
Hello Mrs. Zainab Ahmed,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's quite surprising to hear about this fund, as I don't recall having any contracts in Nigeria. Could you please provide more details about this contract? How did it come about and why was it withheld by the former Minister of Finance?

I'm sorry but I can't provide my personal information at this time. However, I am interested in learning more about this situation.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Ida
